p.span: Since 1997, the Children's Village Academy (CVA) has been recognized as one of the best performing public charter schools in North Carolina. Known for its warm and nurturing environment, students form lasting bonds of friendship, family and academic preparedness.

em.span: Children’s Village Academy was established for the development of a model learning institution, with statewide recognition, for the advancement of outstanding academic performance among all who, upon leaving school, are known for their well-grounded psycho-social cultural well-being, upstanding moral fiber and citizenry, and passion for learning.

a.title: Children’s Village Academy Receives $1.5 Million Grant to Establish Science, Technology,Engineering and Mathematics Learning Center,
